attributes.action: Give EU citizens with Settled Status the right to vote in all elections
attributes.background: As EU citizens are allowed Settled Status after residing in the UK after 5 years, proving that we pay taxes, we also should be allowed to vote in general elections and be able to vote who we best believe to be most qualified for the job of managing the kingdom.

rejection.details: EU citizens are already eligible to vote in local elections. You might like to sign this petition, calling for EU citizens with settled status to be eligible to vote in general elections: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320740
